info.pavie.basicosmparser.controller.hive

Class HiveExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.udf.generic.GenericUDTF
      • info.pavie.basicosmparser.controller.hive.HiveExporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveNodeExporter, HiveRelationExporter, HiveWayExporter

    public abstract class HiveExporter
extends org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.udf.generic.GenericUDTF
    Abstract class, containing common functions to all Hive exporters. See each heriting class for more details.
    Author:
    Adrien PAVIE

      • parseData

        protected void parseData()
                  throws org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException
        Once osmFile attribute is defined, you can call this function to fill elements attribute with read data.
        Throws:
        org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException - If an error occurs during parsing.

      • fillRow

        protected void fillRow(java.lang.Object[] row,
           Element elem)
        This methods fills a row array with common data extracted from the given element.
        Parameters:
        row - The row array (size should be > 7)
        elem - The element to use
